headings.text: Servicing Residential & Commercial Roofs in the Bay Area since 2002
From flooded Tar & Gravel to Sleek TPO: a Half-Duplex Rescue in Martinez

It’s more 
than “code 
compliant.” It’s 
California cool.

Homes in California need to comply with specific “cool 
roof” requirements. Homeowners want rich, beautiful 
colors. And everyone wants the potential of saving on 
cooling costs.1 Why not have it all? All GAF California 
Cool™ Shingles can be used to comply with 2022 Title 24, 
Part 6, Cool Roof requirements of the California Code of 
Regulations. Timberline HDZ® RS Shingles even meet the 
stringent requirements of the Green Building Standards 
Code of Los Angeles County for residential buildings. 
And thanks to innovative EcoDark™ granule technology, 
California Cool™ Shingles come in a vibrant array of 
reflective colors never before seen in a cool roof — 
including the darkest “cool” shingle you can buy.

paragraphs.text: Schedule a professional assessment of your roof at no cost! Our expert project managers provide on-site evaluations and tailored recommendations
With over 24 years of roofing experience, we understand roofing and deliver expert craftsmanship for residential & commercial roofs.
10-Year Workmanship Warranty on Replacements Minimum of 2 years on Qualifying Repairs~ because we know you won't need it. Built to Last!

We transformed a failing gravel roof—so waterlogged it became a small lake—into a durable, watertight TPO system. Tackling only half of the duplex while ensuring seamless drainage and structural integrity, we took on this unique challenge and delivered lasting protection.
Contact us to bring samples of the roof colors of your choice so you can compare it in the sun and shade or put it along your walls to see how it matches your home's color scheme,
